bioconda.name: bioconductor-transcriptr
bioconda.summary: An Integrative Tool for ChIP- And RNA-Seq Based Primary Transcripts Detection and Quantification

biotools.summary: An R package for identifying and quantifying de novo continuous regions of transcription across the genome. The package uses ChIP-seq data of histone modifications that mark active Transcription Start Sites (TSSs) to divide closely spaced transcripts into individually transcriped units.

bioschemas.name: transcriptR
bioschemas.summary: An R package for identifying and quantifying de novo continuous regions of transcription across the genome. The package uses ChIP-seq data of histone modifications that mark active Transcription Start Sites (TSSs) to divide closely spaced transcripts into individually transcriped units.
